meanings.definition: Within or into a ventricle, especially a heart ventricle.
meanings.sent1: The medication was injected intraventricularly to reach the specific area.
meanings.sent2: The dye spread intraventricularly throughout the heart chamber.
meanings.sent3: The tiny robot swam intraventricularly in the heart, fixing any issues it found.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed intraventricularly in the empty chamber of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The light shone intraventricularly, illuminating the inner walls of the ventricle.

meanings.definition: Administered directly into a ventricle, especially the brain ventricles.
meanings.sent1: The intraventricularly delivered drug targeted the affected brain region precisely.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon performed an intraventricularly injection to treat the condition.
meanings.sent3: The brain felt like a busy highway with all the intraventricularly injected substances rushing through.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed intraventricularly, reaching deep into the core of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The music played intraventricularly, stimulating different areas of the brain.
